description: This simple papaya dessert maximises the fruit's sweetness by roasting it.
keywords: Roasted Papaya with Vanilla & Lime Coconut Cream
name: Roasted Papaya with Vanilla & Lime Coconut Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the remaining lime juice and teaspoon of zest with the coconut cream, drizzle on the papaya and serve.
